'''''Sogno di Volare''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete a trip with any of [[Antoine|Antoine Roger]]'s [[The Miraculous Antoine Roger Aircraft|aircraft]] found across [[Fontaine]].

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is probably a reference to the title of the ''{{w|Civilization VI}}'' theme song ''Sogno di Volare''.
** The lyrics of the song are based on Leonardo da Vinci's writings on flight.<ref>Christopher Tin: [https://www.christophertin.com/sheetmusic/sognodivolare.html Sogno di Volare] (Program Notes)</ref>
